page.title: 07Ulcombe Village hall.
page.content: There are a lot of things you can do in the {Ulcombe village hall. In {1983}the Ulcombe {youth club}was run by June Watson.In the{Ulcombe {Village hall }they hold the {club {meetings.}The Ulcombe Village hall sometimes has wedding{receptions. Mr {Tassel}the local {Farmer,}also holds { {Meetings}there. Near the{Village Hall}is a {Play {park}and{Football}Pitch.There is a{ Football Club (Ulcombe has its own{ Football team ).There is also a{ {Cricket}club.The Play Park has six different play things. 1,A witches hat(roundabout). 2,2 sets of swings. 3,A see-saw. 4,A mushroom(roundabout). 5,A slide. 6,A seat.
